title: Football players leap out of the way of a rampaging bull which escaped from nearby slaughterhouse
text:
A bull was caught on camera causing havoc during a football match after it got loose and charged towards players on the pitch.

Spectator Isaac Damián Torres recorded the footage during a match in San Pedro de Jujuy, Argentina, on October 13.

In the video, the black bull can be seen in the centre of the screen charging toward the referee and players on the pitch.

There are audible expressions of concern as the bull continues on its rampage.

Players continue to run and jump out of the bull's way as a one man on a motorcycle tries to force it toward a fence on the far side of the field.

The bull slows down as it reaches the barrier as more spectators begin to flock towards the animal, which is where the video ends.

Isaac Damián Torres, who was a spectator at the match, recorded the footage in San Pedro de Jujuy, Argentina

Players and spectators were all forced to run and jump out of the bull's path as a one man on a motorcycle tried to force the bull toward a fence on the far side of the field

The bull barged onto the field after escaping a nearby slaughterhouse, according to local newspaper Cronica.

It is thought that one person was injured and taken to Guillermo Paterson hospital in the area.

Police launched a search for the bull after attempts by spectators to capture it failed but it is unclear whether it is still on the loose.
description: Isaac Damián Torres, who was a spectator at the match, recorded the footage in San Pedro de Jujuy, Argentina, as the bull went on the rampage. It is thought that one person was injured.
